definition: Karakorum mountain range in west Xinjiang
pinyin: Ka1 la3 kun1 lun2 Shan1 mai4

definition: used in place names, notably Kunlun Mountains 崑崙|昆仑[Kun1 lun2]/(also used for transliteration)
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
arteries and veins/vein (on a leaf, insect wing etc)
